data.name: Adoption Event
data.description: Participating in pet adoption events is a perfect way to connect with a shelter animal â€” and for them to find their forever home. Typically, these animal adoption events draw attention to pets in need. And, to sweeten the deal, some shelters will offer certain promotions to encourage more adoptions during these events.
